synonyms.synonym: PDZ protein interacting specifically with TC10

protein.specific_function: Plays a role in intracellular protein trafficking and degradation. May regulate CFTR chloride currents and acid-induced ACCN3 currents by modulating cell surface expression of both channels. May also regulate the intracellular trafficking of the ADR1B receptor. May play a role in autophagy. Overexpression results in CFTR intracellular retention and degradation in the lysosomes
